iti25:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti25:2.1: “Mendicants, for an individual who transgresses in one thing, there is no bad deed they would not do, I say.
iti25:2.3: It is this: telling a deliberate lie.”
iti25:2.4: That is what the Buddha said.
iti25:3.4: there is no evil they would not do.”
iti25:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
